summary: I don’t care if he won’t be in High School anymore, Eliott’s season would be so so important. Seeing his struggles through...
body: I don’t care if he won’t be in High School anymore, Eliott’s season would be so so important. Seeing his struggles through Lucas’ eyes in a couple of clips is impactful, but still very different from seeing them through his own eyes for a fully fleshed out season.

reblog.comment: I don’t care if he won’t be in High School anymore, Eliott’s season would be so so important. Seeing his struggles through Lucas’ eyes in a couple of clips is impactful, but still very different from seeing them through his own eyes for a fully fleshed out season.

blog.name: kurt-and-blaine-anderson-hummel
blog.title: "Worrying means you suffer twice" - Newt ❤️
blog.description:
Hey there!
The name is Vic. French. 21. 8 months in Canada, 4 months in France. Introvert (ISFP). Intense monoshipper. My social skills are very limited. That's probably more than you needed to know about me. Robron is currently ruining my life and has been for quite some time now, they have completely taken over this blog. Ryan "Gorgeous" Hawley is the actual love of my life. Clois is the ultimate OTP. This used to be a Glee blog, mostly Klaine, but now it's kind of a mess. You can talk to me about SKAM if you want (and by that I mean please talk to me about SKAM). Darren Criss still pops up every once in a while, cause he's cute, you know? I would defend Zach Snyder and BVS with my last dying breath. Don't come for me, I'm very sensitive and will cry. On Tumblr since September 24th 2011. Also, my tags are garbage, you've been warned. Marvel sIde blog: marvels-tony-and-pepper. Photo side blog: focusonthesimplethings. Guznadia (from Elite) side blog: guzman-y-nadia

blog.name: searbao
blog.title: found in cemetery eating bath salts

tags: again tho her actress is amazing like ive not had this much of a reaction to a character in a while
summary:
Unpopular opinion, so feel free to sharpen your pitchforks, but I don't think Lucille redeemed herself, and here's why...
I...
body:
Unpopular opinion, so feel free to sharpen your pitchforks, but I don’t think Lucille redeemed herself, and here’s why…

I think it’s fully understandable for Lucille to be hurt and angry and even a little bit vindictive, but her apology still rang hollow for me. (Disclaimer: this is not one of those ‘blah blah realism’ things, I think her actress is amazing)

The main issue I have is the fact she betrayed Elliot’s trust. What she said to Lucas was awful, yes, but look at how badly she hurt Eliott in the process. So I appreciate her apology and giving her advice to Lucas, but I also don’t like the idea of her being the 'authority’ on eliotts behavior and how someone should handle him. Like I know Lucas is learning and will obviously develop his own ways of dealing with and/or helping Eliott as they spend more time together, so I’m not worried about it having a negative effect, I just think she hasn’t really learned a whole lot…

I guess what I’m saying is it still feels like she thinks of Eliott as someone who needs a caregiver, and less in the way of literally caring for someone and more in the way of just being controlling

I loved the clip today, and agreed with a lot of what she said at the surface level, but I’m sorry I do not forgive her

blog.name: kinglucaslallemant
blog.title: i love you more
blog.description: Audrey, long time Robron addict. All about shippy things... just... lots and lots of shippy things. And happy things, happy things are awesome.

summary: Ya know, when I was brand new to Skam France, and Eliott and Lucas, I saw a post in the tag  (I really wish I could find it but...
body: Ya know, when I was brand new to Skam France, and Eliott and Lucas, I saw a post in the tag  (I really wish I could find it but I think it’s a lost cause) that said something like that Eliott telling Lucas that the first time he saw him he thought “This one, I’m sure he’s afraid of the dark.” is essentially saying “This one, he’s the hero of my story.” and now that I’ve gotten to know the characters that makes my heart hurt. Because that is so, so true. I love the “You’re all I saw.” bit but the other line holds a lot of weight for Eliott. It’s a deeper look into just how sure he was of Lucas from the moment he saw him. And like… fuck fam I’m not made to feel this much.

reblog.comment: Ya know, when I was brand new to Skam France, and Eliott and Lucas, I saw a post in the tag  (I really wish I could find it but I think it’s a lost cause) that said something like that Eliott telling Lucas that the first time he saw him he thought “This one, I’m sure he’s afraid of the dark.” is essentially saying “This one, he’s the hero of my story.” and now that I’ve gotten to know the characters that makes my heart hurt. Because that is so, so true. I love the “You’re all I saw.” bit but the other line holds a lot of weight for Eliott. It’s a deeper look into just how sure he was of Lucas from the moment he saw him. And like… fuck fam I’m not made to feel this much.

Because that is so, so true. I love the “You’re all I saw.” bit but the other line holds a lot of weight for Eliott. It’s a deeper look into just how sure he was of Lucas from the moment he saw him. And like… fuck fam I’m not made to feel this much.

tags: i woke up at 5am with this thought
summary:
guys, i just had a thought..
so lucas' latest ig post had the caption 'the day i turned into daphne'.. on the surface, it was...
body:
guys, i just had a thought..

so lucas’ latest ig post had the caption ‘the day i turned into daphne’.. on the surface, it was about how he’s channeling her very caring, concerned, would do anything for people she loves attitude.

but what if there’s something deeper than that?

does he know about daphne’s mom?? (if they do follow the vilde storyline for daphne)

is that why he seems much closer to her than isak ever was to vilde in the og? he’s the only one who calls her daphy, not even the girls call her that. is it because they are dealing with similar situations with their parents/moms?

idk what do y'all think?

omfg we need a daphne season, like, yesterday.
